name: nonvascular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology, medical
  specialized not relating to or consisting of blood vessels (= tubes that carry blood in a person's or animal's body): Mortality is 50% higher when the cause is vascular than when it is nonvascular. Cartilage is a non-vascular connective tissue found in the body that is softer than bone.
biology, medical
  specialized A nonvascular plant does not have special tissue, called xylem and phloem, that carries water and food around it: Mosses and liverworts are examples of nonvascular plants.
More examplesFewer examplesNeurosurgeons make use of a number of nonvascular procedures.The doctor believed that the headache was caused by a nonvascular disorder.The list of plant species does not include grasses and nonvascular cryptogams.
